document_data.caption: A map showing the Lhespenbog on Lake Lhespen.
document_data.name: Lhespenbog
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lhespenbog''' was a small wetland found in the western [[Shaar]] near the border of [[Lapaliiya]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: The bog was located along the southeastern shore of [[Lake Lhespen]] at the northeastern edge of the [[Shaareach]]. The Lhespenbog was bordered to south and east by the [[Rathgaunt Hills]].
